amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary to take into consideration areas with high unemployment rates that exceed the national average to increase opportunities for small business development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in part C of House Report 111-506 to require the Secretary to take into consideration areas with high unemployment rates that exceed the national average to increase opportunities for small business development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
